review: I've finally been able to convince my wife that there may be a future for this "Internet TV" fad.  Her commitment to me after using this for a few days is that we might actually cut the cord and save over $100 in cable bills every month!  Too bad it took me so long to realize that the Chromecast was just too complicated for her (using apps to control the TV is not anywhere near as convenient as having a dedicated remote control)

review: Fire TV exceeded my expectations. It was very easy to set up and navigate. Photos were a breeze to download. Accessing music playlists makes this worth the price of admission.  Yes, the voice command works, but navigation is so fast and easy. I'm so pleased with Fire TV, I just ordered Fire Stick, too.

review: Excellent media centre box.I have switched over from Netflix to Amazon Prime. Well not a good choice as on Netflix all seasons are free but on Amazon Prime one ot two seasons are free and u have buy the rest of u want to watch.I then installed XBMC/Kodi on the fire tv. It was side loaded from my computer, for instructions goto http://xbmc.org and follow instructions. After the software was installed I set up the fusion hub on XBMC (for instructions watch xbmc how yo videos for fusion on you tube).The world then just opened up. Now I have every season and show and every movie on my finger tips. U watch on xbmc what I want to watch and when I want to watch and without any ads :)
